title: Pete the Cat: The First Thanksgiving: A Thanksgiving Lift-the-Flap Book for Kids
description: Join Pete in New York Times bestselling author James Deanâ€™s Pete the Cat picture book series as Pete celebrates Thanksgiving in this groovy lift-the-flap book!Starring in the school Thanksgiving play would make even the coolest cat nervous. But when Pete the Cat gets onstage, he makes learning the story of the first Thanksgiving fun. With thirteen flaps that open to reveal hidden surprises, this book is sure to be a holiday favorite for every Pete the Cat fan.
author: Kimberly  Dean
